snippet: Colonel Stone, then a first lieutenant, rallied his men in the face of overwhelming Chinese forces, then stayed to cover their retreat, actions that earned him the Medal of Honor.
abstract: James L Stone, Army platoon leader who earned Medal of Honor for his heroism in Korean War, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Colonel Stone, then a first lieutenant, rallied his men in the face of overwhelming Chinese forces, then stayed to cover their retreat, actions that earned him the Medal of Honor.

headline.seo: James L. Stone, Medal of Honor Recipient, Dies at 89
headline.main: James L. Stone, Officer Decorated in Korean War, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: James L. Stone, 89, Officer Decorated in Korean War
